message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120.
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $135 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $125.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to come down to $130, but I really think that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $130, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $127.50.
I'm starting to think that we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $128, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $128, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $126.
I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one last offer at $129, but if you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
I appreciate your last offer, but $129 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $125, and that's my final offer.
